node.detail_zh: 患者於 7 月 19 日出現症狀，與第 #1772 及 #1778 個案患者有關連。
node.detail_en: The patient developed symptoms on July 19, and her case has epidemiological linkage to those of patients #1772 and #1778.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 屯門眼科中心有 4 名員工確診，分別是 3 名文員及 1 名運作服務助理。3 名文員是負責收銀以及將病歷交予病人，每日要接觸約 200 名病人，可能因為病人的八達通、錢或者醫生介紹信感染。
groups.description_en: From the Tuen Mun Eye Centre, 4 employees were tested positive, 3 of them were clerical staff, while 1 of them is an operational service assistant. The 3 clerical staff were responsible for cashier services and sharing medical records with patients. They have contact with approximately 200 patients per day. Transmission could have occurred via handling Octopus cards, cash, or doctor recommendation letters from the patients.
